Billings.Billings, Montana:
Billings is the largest city in the U.S. state of Montana, and the principal city of the Billings Metropolitan Area with a population of 166,855. It has a trade area of over half a million people.
Billings is located in the south-central portion of the state and is the seat of Yellowstone County, which had a 2015 population of 157,048.
